alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 22 at 7:41AM MDT until June 22 at 10:39PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Colorado... Fountain Creek Near Pinon affecting Pueblo County. Arkansas River NEAR Avondale affecting Pueblo County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Colorado... Fountain Creek Near Fountain affecting El Paso County. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Pueblo, Avondale, Nepesta, Fowler, Rocky Ford, La Junta, Lamar...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Fountain Creek...including Colorado Springs, Fountain, Pinon, Pueblo...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Fountain Creek Near Pinon. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Water threatens buildings near 28th Street in Pueblo. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM MDT Thursday the stage was 11.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 13.5 feet late this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Fountain Creek Pinon 12.0 11.5 Thu 7 am MDT 7.0 6.4 MSG &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this morning at 845 AM MDT.
